subject: AccuWeather.com Alert(tm) Advisory  (avcavc)
body:
AccuWeather.com Alert[TM]






















 







							Severe Watches and Warnings for BEVERLY HILLS 













LOXNPWLOX
WWUS76 KLOX 101100
NPWLOX

URGENT - WEATHER MESSAGE
NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE LOS ANGELES/OXNARD CA
400 AM PDT THU MAY 10 2007

..DENSE FOG EXPECTED THROUGH THE MORNING OVER THE LOS ANGELES
AND VENTURA COUNTY COASTS...

AREAS OF DENSE FOG WITH VISIBILITIES OF ONE QUARTER MILE OR LESS
WILL CONTINUE ACROSS COASTAL AREAS OF VENTURA AND LOS ANGELES
COUNTIES THIS MORNING. THE VISIBILITIES WILL BEGIN TO LIFT AROUND
900 AM PDT.

CAZ040-041-101600-
/O.CON.KLOX.FG.Y.0010.000000T0000Z-070510T1600Z/
VENTURA COUNTY COAST-
LOS ANGELES COUNTY COAST INCLUDING DOWNTOWN LOS ANGELES-
400 AM PDT THU MAY 10 2007

..DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PDT THIS
MORNING...

A DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PDT THIS MORNING.

AREAS OF DENSE FOG WILL AFFECT THE COAST OF VENTURA AND LOS
ANGLES COUNTIES THIS MORNING WITH VISIBILITIES OF ONE QUARTER
MILE OR LESS.

MAJOR ROADWAYS THAT WILL BE IMPACTED BY THE DENSE FOG INCLUDE
INTERSTATE 10 BETWEEN SANTA MONICA AND DOWNTOWN...INTERSTATE 405
NEAR THE COAST...AND HIGHWAY 1 ALONG THE COAST INCLUDING AREAS
FROM MALIBU TO OXNARD.

DRIVERS ARE URGED TO USE CAUTION AS VISIBILITIES IN FOG CAN GO FROM
MORE THAN MILE TO LESS THAN SEVERAL HUNDRED FEET IN AN INSTANT. SLOW
DOWN...USE YOUR LOW BEAM HEADLIGHTS...AND INCREASE YOUR FOLLOWING
DISTANCE AROUND YOU.

$$

RAT/RORKE
